response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it could be even more valuable to you at $1,300,000. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way we can assist you in making your decision. We are here to answer any questions you might have and help ensure that this acquisition aligns perfectly with your goals.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
